page.description: TMHU is a collection of spiritual courses at The Meeting House.

content.title: TMHU
content.description: Check out our latest TMHU courses.

content.text1: TMHU is a collection of spiritual courses designed to deepen our faith and understanding of topics like the Bible, Jesus, pop culture, and lots more.
Jesus 101 is a three-part course exploring who Jesus was, what his message is, and what it means to follow him. Anyone who wants to learn more about Jesus or discipleship is welcome!

An overview of the big story of the Bible, from Genesis to Revelation. This course should help you zoom out to see the larger “meta-narrative” of Scripture, so that studying specific books or passages will make more sense in their context.

image1.alt: Two people sitting and talking during Home Church

content.text1: This course is intended to help us engage with the world around us in a Jesus-centred way. From healthy use of our devices, to how to avoid being trapped in a social media echo chamber, we'll use tv shows, music, movies, and memes to help us move from being consumers of culture to creators.

image1.alt: Team of pastors from The Meeting House sitting around a table and recording a podcast.

content.text1: Learn how this prolonged season of uncertainty and anxiety is impacting our kids and equip them for discipleship as we continue to navigate the choppy waters of culture and trauma. This workshop series will guide through facts about trauma and anxiety, understanding identity in a Jesus-centred way, spiritual disciplines, and activities to foster a culture of prayer and kingdom goodness.

image1.alt: Two parents walking with their young child.
Three people sitting around a dining room table eating snacks.
